hackathon-description-text: HackCWRU is Cleveland's premier student-run college hackathon. Our unique track system encourages hackers to apply their skills to solve real world problems. Join us at Case Western Reserve University on April 15-16!
hackathon-eligibility: You must be a student in order to submit for prizes.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Amazon Web Services - Best Use of AWS

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: For best hack by a beginner, as defined by hackathon as well as technical experience.
Memorial prize for Professor Steven Garverick awarded for best hardware hack.
The winner of the health track will receive Xiaomi Mi Band fitness trackers
The winner of the civic track will win Rasberry Pi Zero kits supplied by Rockwell
Winners of the Open Source track will receive 6 months of github premium
Winners of the Arts track will win 3 months of spotify premium
Winners of the maker track will receive a $35 Newegg gift card
Winners of the Fintech track will receive .03 btc (~$35)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2074 Adelbert Rd, Cleveland, OH 44106, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create something in one of six project tracks at HackCWRU 2017
hackathon-location-description: Case Western Reserve University - Hovorka Atrium
